column5: I will be staying on the Minnesota side of Rainy Lake and I am considering buying both Mn. and Ontario fishing licenses. If I cross over the border by water, do I have to check in with customs each time?

When are you going up? You can get a remote area b order pass but it takes about a month? Youmight be able to get them in person @ international Falls?? LOTW has remote phones so you can call in? I do not know if Rainy lake has these? If they do not they should have a checkin somewhere? Call the resort you are staying at they should be able to tell you. Good Luck
